message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, $15000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12500 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13500. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm open to further negotiations if you're willing to meet me halfway.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $13500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13250. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
